short_summary: Installation of irrigation system maintenance and management services
description: Installation of new irrigation system huge project
full_summary:
**Title**
Canadian Department of Public Works and Government Services
EZ899-250169 Irrigation System Upgrades

**Tender Information**
* **Reference Number**: WS4670095533-Doc4671489994
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4670095533
* **Publication Date**: July 5, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 26, 2024 at 14:00 (Eastern Time)
* **Tender Status**: Expired

**Scope of Work**
The procurement objective is to enter into a contract with a qualified contractor to perform construction work related to the Summerland Irrigation System Upgrades at the Agriculture and Agrifoods (AAFC) Research and Development Centre in Summerland, B.C.

**Description of Services**
The successful bidder will be expected to provide labour, equipment, and materials required to complete the following work:

* Install a high-density polyethylene (HDPE) supply line
* Install polyvinyl chloride (PVC) distribution mains to service individual fields
* Install two new pressure reducing valve (PRV) stations
* Upgrade the accessibility of the existing reservoir
* Perform other related works

**Specifications**
The scope of work includes the following specifications:

* UNSPSC codes: 70171700, 72141106, 72141121, 72141126, and 72141505
* Description:
	+ Irrigation system maintenance and management services
	+ Gravel or dirt road construction service
	+ Water main construction service
	+ Underground utilities construction service
	+ Earthmoving service

**Important Dates**

* Expected Contract Start Date: August 30, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: February 28, 2026

**Contact Information**
For any additional information, please contact:

Donna Fung
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Email: [donna.fung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:donna.fung@tpsgc-pwgsc gc.ca)

**Additional Resources**

* Tender Notice URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20233760?extsite=MjAyMzM3NjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20233760?extsite=MjAyMzM3NjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5
